subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Tyler Hamilton served a two-year ban for blood doping that ended in 2007. He won the time trial gold medal at the 2004 Olympics in Athens but was later accused of blood doping.
snippet: Tyler Hamilton served a two-year ban for blood doping that ended in 2007. He won the time trial gold medal at the 2004 Olympics in Athens but was later accused of blood doping.
